text: piṉṉar ‘‘nī ovvoru puṣpattiliruntum pucittu, uṉatiṟaivaṉ uṉakku aṟivitta eḷitāṉa vaḻiyil (uṉ kūṭṭukkuḷ) oṭuṅkic cel (eṉak kaṭṭaḷai iṭṭāṉ). Itaṉāl ataṉ vayiṟṟiliruntu pala niṟaṅkaḷaiyuṭaiya oru pāṉam (tēṉ) veḷiyākiṟatu. Atil maṉitarkaḷukku nivāraṇamuṇṭu. Niccayamāka itilum cintikkakkūṭiya makkaḷukku ōr attāṭci irukkiṟatu
